record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - November 05, 2007)

[Page: H12477]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks and include extraneous material in the Record on H. Res. 744.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from California?
